title: SCP-CN-4K：Arrow English
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:component:pride-highlighter |inc-s9-lsb-alt= --]]]


[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

**Item #:** SCP-CN-4000

**Object Class:** Estoric Class

**Special Containment Procedures:** SCP-CN-4000 is very dangerous, to contain it, the Foundation must be stay very focus, so the breach won't happen in future. 

To be specific, two guards must exist in 24/7 before the door of the room containing the object, the people should switch every 8 hours considering to give them somtimes to rest.  

Generraly, nothing will really happen, so just keep the contaiment room empty to avoid suspicious people who wants to make breach, such people are always the agents from Chaos Insurgent. 

**Description:** SCP-CN-4000 is a kind of word game, aka palindrome. It is very hard which is obvious a anomaly. The existence of SCP-CN-4000 is absolute bad, we, as the foundation, cannot let it continue run on public. 

**Notes from Dr.Anon:** "Truly we should contain this, because what it all can do is fucking every students' minds."

"Remember guys, we Secure, we Contain, we Protect."
